article_title: Big Data Gives Us More To Argue About

article_metadata.description: Sometimes, you just know you’re right. That’s what happened to both Paul R. Ehrlich, the noted biologist and Stanford University professor, and Julian Simon, the late economist, even though their opinions about the future of humanity were exactly opposite.
article_metadata.author: Oracle
